short_summary: Prequalification of general contracting services for the construction and fit-up of future offices
description: Telefilm Canada is currently seeking to pre-qualify contractors to participate in the call for tenders for the construction and fit-up of its future offices ", which will take place in early 2025.
full_summary:
=====================================

### Tender Notice: Prequalification of General Contracting Services

#### Tender Information

*   **Title:** Prequalification of General Contracting Services
*   **Reference Number:** cb-705-77177717
*   **Publication Date:** November 14, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** December 2, 2024, at 20:00:00
*   **Contracting Entity:** Telefilm Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Address:**
    *   360 Saint-Jacques Street
    *   Montreal, QC
    *   H2Y 4A9, Canada

#### Project Overview

Telefilm Canada is issuing an invitation to prequalify contractors for a construction and fit-up project for its future offices. The project is expected to commence in early 2025 and will involve the construction and fit-up of the office facilities.

#### Prequalification Requirements

To be considered for prequalification, contractors must meet the requirements outlined in the attached questionnaires and assessment forms (available on the Canada Bid website). Contractors will be assessed based on their operational and technical capabilities, as well as the quality of their responses.

#### Tender Method

The tender for this project will be conducted through an open bidding process. The selected contractor will be responsible for the construction and fit-up of the office facilities, which will meet the Telefilm Canada's specifications and requirements.

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions regarding this prequalification process, please contact:

*   Gessy Houle, Contract Officer
*   Phone: (438) 451-0835
*   Email: [appel4@telefilm.ca](mailto:appel4@telefilm.ca)

#### Documentation

All relevant documentation, including the tender notice, project specifications, and questionnaires, are available on the Canada Bid website. Interested contractors are encouraged to review these documents carefully before submitting their prequalification applications.
